title: How much money can one make by freelance work with writing jobs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well it depends on different factors, some of them are as follows-: If you're writing something for a website in India you will end up earning some thousands in a month.If you're writing for some foreign clients via freelancing websites viz Freelancer.com, Fiverr.com, Upwork.com etc you can earn upto $500- $1000 a month easily. But there is a catch, you must have a very good command over your English writing skills.Writing journals and articles as a freelancer for some newspapers can also get you a decent money. But again you must have your command over your English writing skills.

Have you ever ride bycycle on a bridge. When you go from one side you have to enclose with all your power and once you reach at the top of the bridge the bycycle goes automatically without hitting the paddle. Cycle goes the lower, speed increases more and more. Once you start earning in freelancing, things will happen automatically and the income you will make worth manage all your expenses.
